title: I Have a Hope That Cheers My Heart

verses.text:
I have a hope that cheers my heart,
A hope divinely given,
That Jesus soon will reappear,
And take his saints to heaven.

I have a hope that Jesus lives,
And that he'll come again,
To reign on earth a thousand years,
With all his holy train.

I have a hope that I shall stand
Among that blessed throng,
And with the ransom'd multitude,
Sing the triumphant song.

I have a hope that I shall see
The New Jerusalem,
And walk its streets of purest gold,
With Christ, the spotless Lamb.

I have a hope that I shall dwell
Where tears shall never flow,
Where pain and sorrow, death and sin,
The heart shall never know.

Then let this hope within me burn,
And shed its cheering ray,
To guide my steps to that blest land,
Of everlasting day.
